entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Castlegar Airport 1:00 PM PST Monday 06 February 2023

Visibility: 19.3 km

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Snow level rising to 1000 metres this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to near valley bottom near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
